thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 18 of 288
thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: I've been skeptical about the whole "mail your groceries" movement because I LOVE to cook with FRESH ingredients. But, as a working mom, meal planning, grocery shopping, and cooking were becoming a chore. I was wasting money on spoiled food or going out to eat because yet again I forgot to take food out of the freezer in time for dinner. I had an opportunity to try HelloFresh and was VERY skeptical. After my first box, I was intrigued but not convinced. I ordered a second box to see if the first box was just "extra good" to try and hook you in. Every box has been consistently good. I love that I can pick the recipes I want - especially with a picky family. HelloFresh brings me fresh foods, great recipes, and time and money saved! I see this as a long term solution to our meal planning woes!
